Class: MapMarker

MapMarker

Creates an instance of MapMarker. Stores a Google Maps marker and the listeners associated to it.

Constructor

new MapMarker(markerData)

Parameters:
Name Type Description
markerData object
Properties:
Name Type Attributes Description
markerData.id int
markerData.type string Marker type the options are interestPoint || mainPoint
markerData.title string This will be used to set the marker title and the infoWindow title
markerData.web string <optional>
 Optional: WikePedia information with the web address
markerData.phone string <optional>
 Optional: WikePedia information with the phone
markerData.thumb string <optional>
 Optional: WikePedia information with the thumb
markerData.description string <optional>
 Optional: WikePedia information with the description
markerData.address string <optional>
 with the address
markerData.map google.maps.Map Optional: Target map for this marker
markerData.position google.maps.LaLnt Geoposition of the marker
markerData.infoWindow google.maps.InfoWindow
markerData.icon string
markerData.markersArray array Array to store the marker @see Search
marker google.maps.Marker Stores the google.maps.Marker object. Is created using the markerData
